__e: He wants nothing more to do with you, and neither do I.
My tie with you is much stronger than it was in the first years of our marriage.
Isn't there any part of you that feels a bond with the rest of us?
So would you mind putting the noose round your own neck?
Before I walked out, I was standing on a chair in my living room with a noose around my neck.
Having only one kid is like having only one noose around your neck.
I know it doesn't make any sense, but... there's a bond between us.
Your sister wished to sever any connection between her daughter and you, or anyone else so that the girl could grow up in peace and no-one know her true identity.
One thing that hasn't is the bond we original seven share, even if one of us isn't here tonight.
Used our blood ties to your Mama to have us move his drugs up and down our mountain... the way you're moving me right now.
I think it's time you two developed a friendship... 'cause if you don't, he'll move away and we'll never see him again.
You have no idea how much this pains me, but my duty far surpasses the bond of blood.
What you've bonded to is the idea of becoming your mother-
A bond that nobody else can understand, but I understand what you're going through.
"And here," I said, "is the lanyard I made at camp." (laughter)
Tie it in a circle and put it round his arm, alright mate?
Quit thinkin' about throwin' that rope and start gettin' my hands blistered a new way.
And I'm hoping that your kindness is huge and that, even though I've burned that bridge and you have no reason to trust me at all, that you will give me a chance to talk to you
